DOC.brief_summary: BEST4US compare effectiveness two form self-help intervention target college student , age 18 year 22 year , report binge eat . The overall question whether one format prevent excess weight gain lead difference eat behavior . The two format ( 1 ) `` pure self-help '' ( receipt self-help program via book form online text ) ( 2 ) combination self-help program guidance provide trained peer coach course 8 weekly session .
